I_want: the ability to create my own profile with username and password
such_that: I can sign up to courses

I_want: the ability to login to my profile using username and password
such_that: I can continue working on my courses

I_want: the ability to view my assignments
the ability to view the status of my assignments
such_that: I can see if they are paused, in progress or completed

I_want: the ability to view the deadline of my assignments
the ability to view the description of my assignments
such_that: I can understand what is expected from me

I_want: the ability to view the detailed results of my assignments
such_that: I can see what I did wrong

I_want: the ability to view the feedback of my assignments
such_that: I can understand what I did wrong

I_want: the ability to submit solutions to my assignments, by uploading a file
the ability to check if my solution has been evaluated
the ability to cancel the submission of my solution if it has not been evaluated
such_that: I can make changes to my solution

I_want: the ability to view the detailed results of my solution
such_that: I can see what I did wrong

I_want: my solutions be processed fairly among the other students
such_that: I can trust the system in evaluating my solutions
I can easily navigate through the system
